Exports the Drupal DB as SQL using mysqldump or equivalent.

No arguments
Save to a file. The file should be relative to Drupal root. If --result-file is provided with the value 'auto', a date-based filename will be created under ~/drush-backups directory.Omit DROP TABLE statements. Used by Postgres and Oracle only.Dump data without statements to create any of the schema.Order by primary key and add line breaks for efficient diffs. Slows down the dump.
